Name: Jack-o'-NightLight
Text: Hey, it kinda looks like a bug net... neat... but wait, weren't these... [i]dream[/i] bugs we were talking about? I forget.

Name: Tired Witch
Text: ...Just hang it over your head while you sleep and it'll take care of the bugs for you.

Name: Jack-o'-NightLight
Text: Ahh... I see. Thank you. If it's okay with you... I'm gonna go pass out now.
